## Data

```{r}
df <- data.frame(
  ID = 1:5,                             
  Name = c("Alice", "Bob", "Carol", "Dave", "Eve"), 
  Age = c(25, 30, 22, 35, 28),         
  Score = c(85.5, 90.3, 78.9, 88.0, 92.4),
  Passed = c(TRUE, TRUE, FALSE, TRUE, TRUE)
)

df

```


## Discrete

```{r, fig.align='center'}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(
  data = df,
  mapping = aes(x = Name, y = Age, fill = Name)) +
  geom_col() +
  scale_fill_dune_d(name = "harkonnen_4")

ggplot(data = iris,
    mapping = aes(x = Sepal.Width, y = Sepal.Length, color = Species)) + 
    geom_point(size = 2) + 
    scale_color_dune_d(name = "maythyknifechipandshatter")

```



## Continious 

```{r, fig.align='center'}
ggplot(
  data = df,
  mapping = aes(x = Name, y = Score, fill = Score)
) +
  geom_col() +
  scale_fill_dune_c(name = "whatsinthebox")

ggplot(iris) + 
    aes(x = Species, y = Sepal.Width,
        color = Sepal.Length) + 
    geom_point(size = 2) + 
    scale_color_dune_c(name = "sandworm")


```
